title: Modena
summary: Modena (UK: /ˈmɒdɪnə/,[3] US: /ˈmoʊd-/,[4][5] Italian: [ˈmɔːdena] (listen); Modenese: Mòdna [ˈmɔdnɐ]; Etruscan: Mutna; Latin: Mutina) is a city and comune (municipality) on the south side of the Po Valley, in the Province of Modena in the Emilia-Romagna region of northern Italy.
